(High)

(High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/OrganizationMemberList.cs] [Function: Count()] [State Inconsistency] If organizationMembers_ is modified directly outside of AddMember/RemoveMember (e.g., via reflection or unsafe operations), could Count() return values inconsistent with actual governance power distribution? [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/OrganizationMemberList.cs] [Function: Count()] [DOS] Could an attacker add millions of members to make Count() operations extremely expensive, causing proposal validation in Validate() to timeout or consume excessive gas? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/OrganizationMemberList.cs] [Function: Count()] [Validation Bypass] If Count() returns 0 for a newly created but uninitialized organizationMembers_ field, could this bypass the Empty() check in Validate() and allow creation of organizations with no members? [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/OrganizationMemberList.cs] [Function: Empty()] [Logic Error] Does Empty() correctly handle null vs. zero-length organizationMembers_ lists, and could a null list bypass the Empty() validation check in Validate() allowing memberless organizations? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/OrganizationMemberList.cs] [Function: Empty()] [Race Condition] If Empty() is checked in Validate() while RemoveMember is executing concurrently, could the organization become empty between the Empty() check and state commit, violating the 'never empty' invariant? [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/OrganizationMemberList.cs] [Function: Empty()] [Validation Bypass] Since Empty() only checks Count() == 0, could an organization with members that all have null/invalid addresses pass the Empty() check but fail to function for proposal approval? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/OrganizationMemberList.cs] [Function: Empty()] [State Transition] If RemoveMember removes the last member, Empty() becomes true, but does the subsequent Validate() call prevent this, or could the last member removal succeed and freeze the organization permanently? [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/OrganizationMemberList.cs] [Function: Empty()] [Initialization] For newly created organizations before any members are added, does Empty() return true, and could this allow proposals to be created on empty organizations before CreateOrganization validates membership? [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/OrganizationMemberList.cs] [Function: Contains(Address address)] [DOS] If organizationMembers_ contains millions of members, does Contains() perform a linear search causing O(n) complexity that could make Approve/Reject operations prohibitively expensive?
